name: Adding Fractions with Like Denominators
description: Students will learn to add fractions that have the same denominator by adding numerators and keeping the denominator the same.
subject: Mathematics

name: Subtracting Fractions with Like Denominators
description: Students will learn to subtract fractions that have the same denominator by subtracting numerators and keeping the denominator the same.
subject: Mathematics

name: Multiplying Decimals
description: Students will learn to multiply decimal numbers by understanding place value and decimal point placement.
subject: Mathematics

name: Dividing Decimals
description: Students will learn to divide decimal numbers by understanding place value and decimal point placement.
subject: Mathematics

name: Comparing Fractions
description: Students will learn to compare fractions using visual models and mathematical reasoning.
subject: Mathematics
